OMNITURE_EXPORT_BRM_CFG.applications_preheader: Generic Data Source (Transaction ID) template file (user: 2717846 ds_id: 2)NEWLINE	Products	application submitted tally	1NEWLINE Number of Records:
OMNITURE_EXPORT_BRM_CFG.applications_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(map.date_inserted, '%%m/%%d/%%Y')  AS click_date, t.bannerid AS product_id, 1 AS event_50, map.apply_id AS apply_id_trans_id FROM   transactions_apply_map      AS map JOIN transactions_recent    AS t    ON map.trans_id       = t.transid and   t.affiliateid    = '100002' JOIN applications           AS a    ON map.trans_id       = a.transaction_id join transactions_affiliate as ta   on  ta.transaction_id = t.transid and ta.website_id = 4621  WHERE  1 = 1 AND a.state = 'COMMITTED' AND map.date_inserted >= %s - INTERVAL 180 DAY       AND map.date_inserted <  %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY    AND  a.last_updated >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  a.last_updated <  %s
OMNITURE_EXPORT_BRM_CFG.applications_query_recent: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(map.date_inserted, '%%m/%%d/%%Y')  AS click_date, t.bannerid AS product_id, 1 AS event_50, map.apply_id AS apply_id_trans_id FROM   transactions_apply_map      AS map JOIN transactions_recent    AS t    ON map.trans_id       = t.transid and   t.affiliateid    = '100002' JOIN applications           AS a    ON map.trans_id       = a.transaction_id join transactions_affiliate as ta   on  ta.transaction_id = t.transid and ta.website_id = 4621  WHERE  1 = 1 AND a.state = 'COMMITTED' AND map.date_inserted >= %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY       AND map.date_inserted <  %s + INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  a.last_updated >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  a.last_updated <  %s
OMNITURE_EXPORT_BRM_CFG.email_subject: dba_msg - BRM Omniture Daily Transfer report
OMNITURE_EXPORT_BRM_CFG.sales_preheader: Generic Data Source (Transaction ID) template file (user: 2717846 ds_id: 3)NEWLINE	Products	app approved (sale)	app approved tally	1NEWLINE Number of Records:
OMNITURE_EXPORT_BRM_CFG.sales_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tl.offer_click_time, '%%m/%%d/%%Y')  AS click_date,tl.card_id AS product_id, tl.revenue AS event_51,1 AS event_52, tl.apply_id AS apply_id FROM transactions_ledger AS tl Left join transactions tr On tl.trans_id = tr.transid and tr.affiliateid = '100002' join transactions_affiliate ta on ta.transaction_id = tl.ref_trans_id and ta.website_id = 4621 WHERE 1 = 1 AND tl.offer_click_time >= %s - INTERVAL 180 DAY       AND tl.offer_click_time <  %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY    AND  tl.insert_time >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  tl.insert_time <  %s AND  tl.trans_type in ('4', '5', '6') AND tl.orig_table = 'transactions_upload' AND tl.orig_action = 'insert' AND tl.apply_id IS NOT NULL
OMNITURE_EXPORT_BRM_CFG.sales_query_recent: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tl.offer_click_time, '%%m/%%d/%%Y')  AS click_date,tl.card_id AS product_id, tl.revenue AS event_51,1 AS event_52, tl.apply_id AS apply_id FROM transactions_ledger AS tl Left join transactions tr On tl.trans_id = tr.transid and tr.affiliateid = '100002' join transactions_affiliate ta on ta.transaction_id = tl.ref_trans_id and ta.website_id = 4621 WHERE 1 = 1 AND tl.offer_click_time >= %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY       AND tl.offer_click_time <  %s + INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  tl.insert_time >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  tl.insert_time <  %s AND  tl.trans_type in ('4', '5', '6') AND tl.orig_table = 'transactions_upload' AND tl.orig_action = 'insert' AND tl.apply_id IS NOT NULL

OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.applications_preheader: Generic Data Source (Transaction ID) template file (user: 2717846 ds_id: 2)NEWLINE	Products	application submitted tally	1NEWLINE Number of Records:
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.applications_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(map.date_inserted, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS click_time,             t.bannerid                                   AS card_id_product,             1                                   AS event_21,             map.apply_id                                  AS apply_id_trans_id FROM        transactions_apply_map AS map JOIN transactions_recent    AS t    ON map.trans_id       = t.transid JOIN transactions_affiliate AS ta   ON ta.transaction_id  = t.transid AND ta.website_id     in (5696, 40060) JOIN applications           AS a    ON map.trans_id       = a.transaction_id AND a.state            = 'COMMITTED' WHERE  1 = 1        AND map.date_inserted >= %s - INTERVAL 180 DAY       AND map.date_inserted <  %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY       AND  a.last_updated  >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  a.last_updated  <  %s
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.applications_query_recent: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(map.date_inserted, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS click_time,             t.bannerid                                   AS card_id_product,             1                                   AS event_21,             map.apply_id                                  AS apply_id_trans_id FROM        transactions_apply_map AS map JOIN transactions_recent    AS t    ON map.trans_id       = t.transid JOIN transactions_affiliate AS ta   ON ta.transaction_id  = t.transid AND ta.website_id     in (5696, 40060) JOIN applications           AS a    ON map.trans_id       = a.transaction_id AND a.state            = 'COMMITTED' WHERE  1 = 1        AND map.date_inserted >= %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY       AND map.date_inserted <  %s + INTERVAL 1 DAY AND  a.last_updated  >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  a.last_updated  <  %s
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.negative_adjustments_preheader: Generic Data Source (Transaction ID) template file (user: 2717846 ds_id: 4)NEWLINE	Products	neg adjustment	neg adjustment tally	1NEWLINE Number of Records:
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.negative_adjustments_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(l.offer_click_time, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS click_time,             l.card_id                                   AS CC_card_id_OM_product_id,             ABS(l.revenue)                                   AS CC_revenue_OM_event_24,             ABS(l.quantity)                                  AS CC_quantity_OM_event25,             l.apply_id                                  AS CC_apply_id_OM_transid      FROM        transactions_ledger AS l             JOIN transactions_ledger AS filter   ON filter.ref_trans_id = l.ref_trans_id and filter.trans_type   = 4 and filter.orig_table   = 'transactions_upload' and filter.orig_action  = 'insert'  join transactions_affiliate AS ta       ON ta.transaction_id   = l.ref_trans_id and ta.website_id      in ( 5696, 40060)     WHERE  1 = 1        AND l.offer_click_time >= %s - INTERVAL 180 DAY       AND l.offer_click_time <  %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY        AND  l.revenue     < 0        AND  l.apply_id IS NOT NULL        AND  l.insert_time >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  l.insert_time <  %s      GROUP  BY l.transactions_ledger_id
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.negative_adjustments_query_recent: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(l.offer_click_time, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS click_time,             l.card_id                                   AS CC_card_id_OM_product_id,             ABS(l.revenue)                                   AS CC_revenue_OM_event_24,             ABS(l.quantity)                                  AS CC_quantity_OM_event25,             l.apply_id                                  AS CC_apply_id_OM_transid      FROM        transactions_ledger AS l             JOIN transactions_ledger AS filter   ON filter.ref_trans_id = l.ref_trans_id and filter.trans_type   = 4 and filter.orig_table   = 'transactions_upload' and filter.orig_action  = 'insert'  join transactions_affiliate AS ta       ON ta.transaction_id   = l.ref_trans_id and ta.website_id      in ( 5696, 40060)     WHERE  1 = 1        AND l.offer_click_time >= %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY       AND l.offer_click_time <  %s + INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  l.revenue     < 0        AND  l.apply_id IS NOT NULL        AND  l.insert_time >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  l.insert_time <  %s      GROUP  BY l.transactions_ledger_id
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.positive_adjustments_preheader: Generic Data Source (Transaction ID) template file (user: 2717846 ds_id: 5)NEWLINE	Products	positive adjustment	positive adjustment tally	1NEWLINE Number of Records:
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.positive_adjustments_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(l.offer_click_time, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS click_time,             l.card_id                                   AS CC_card_id_OM_product_id,             l.revenue                                   AS CC_revenue_OM_event_24,             l.quantity                                  AS CC_quantity_OM_event25,             l.apply_id                                  AS CC_apply_id_OM_transid      FROM        transactions_ledger AS l             JOIN transactions_ledger AS filter   ON filter.ref_trans_id = l.ref_trans_id and filter.trans_type   = 4 and filter.orig_table   = 'transactions_upload' and filter.orig_action  = 'insert' join transactions_affiliate AS ta   on ta.transaction_id   = l.ref_trans_id and ta.website_id      in ( 5696 , 40060)      WHERE  1 = 1        AND l.offer_click_time >= %s - INTERVAL 180 DAY       AND l.offer_click_time <  %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY        AND  l.revenue     >= 0        AND  l.apply_id IS NOT NULL        AND  l.insert_time >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  l.insert_time <  %s      GROUP  BY l.transactions_ledger_id
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.positive_adjustments_query_recent: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(l.offer_click_time, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS click_time,             l.card_id                                   AS CC_card_id_OM_product_id,             l.revenue                                   AS CC_revenue_OM_event_24,             l.quantity                                  AS CC_quantity_OM_event25,             l.apply_id                                  AS CC_apply_id_OM_transid      FROM        transactions_ledger AS l             JOIN transactions_ledger AS filter   ON filter.ref_trans_id = l.ref_trans_id and filter.trans_type   = 4 and filter.orig_table   = 'transactions_upload' and filter.orig_action  = 'insert' join transactions_affiliate AS ta   on ta.transaction_id   = l.ref_trans_id and ta.website_id      in ( 5696 , 40060)      WHERE  1 = 1        AND l.offer_click_time >= %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY       AND l.offer_click_time <  %s + INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  l.revenue     >= 0        AND  l.apply_id IS NOT NULL        AND  l.insert_time >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  l.insert_time <  %s      GROUP  BY l.transactions_ledger_id
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.revenue_preheader: Generic Data Source (Transaction ID) template file (user: 2722296 ds_id: 17)NEWLINE	Products	Estimated Slotting	1NEWLINE Number of Records:
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.revenue_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dateinserted, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS date_inserted,             bannerid                                   AS card_id_product,             estimatedrevenue                                   AS estimated_revenue_event11,             map.apply_id                                  AS apply_id_trans_id      FROM        rev_slotting_transactions AS rst             LEFT JOIN transactions_apply_map AS map  ON  map.trans_id      = rst.reftrans WHERE  1 = 1 AND transtype          in (103,104) AND affiliateid        <> '100002' AND rst.dateestimated >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  rst.dateestimated <  %s
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.revenue_query_recent: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dateinserted, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS date_inserted,             bannerid                                   AS card_id_product,             estimatedrevenue                                   AS estimated_revenue_event11,             map.apply_id                                  AS apply_id_trans_id      FROM        rev_slotting_transactions AS rst             LEFT JOIN transactions_apply_map AS map  ON  map.trans_id      = rst.reftrans WHERE  1 = 1 AND transtype          in (103,104) AND affiliateid        <> '100002' AND rst.dateestimated >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  rst.dateestimated <  %s
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.sales_preheader: Generic Data Source (Transaction ID) template file (user: 2717846 ds_id: 3)NEWLINE	Products	app approved (sale)	app approved tally	1NEWLINE Number of Records:
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.sales_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tl.offer_click_time, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS click_time,             tl.card_id                                   AS card_id_product,             tl.revenue                                   AS event_22,             1                                  AS event_23,             tl.apply_id                                  AS apply_id      FROM        transactions_ledger AS tl             join transactions_affiliate AS ta  on ta.transaction_id = tl.ref_trans_id AND ta.website_id    in ( 5696, 40060)      WHERE  1 = 1        AND tl.offer_click_time >= %s - INTERVAL 180 DAY       AND tl.offer_click_time <  %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY        AND  tl.insert_time >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  tl.insert_time <  %s   AND tl.trans_type        = 4 AND tl.orig_table        = 'transactions_upload' and tl.orig_action       = 'insert' AND tl.apply_id     IS NOT NULL
OMNITURE_EXPORT_CFG.sales_query_recent: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tl.offer_click_time, '%%m/%%d/%%Y') AS click_time,             tl.card_id                                   AS card_id_product,             tl.revenue                                   AS event_22,             1                                  AS event_23,             tl.apply_id                                  AS apply_id      FROM        transactions_ledger AS tl             join transactions_affiliate AS ta  on ta.transaction_id = tl.ref_trans_id AND ta.website_id    in ( 5696, 40060)      WHERE  1 = 1        AND tl.offer_click_time >= %s - INTERVAL 90 DAY       AND tl.offer_click_time <  %s + INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  tl.insert_time >= %s - INTERVAL 1 DAY        AND  tl.insert_time <  %s AND tl.trans_type        = 4 AND tl.orig_table        = 'transactions_upload' and tl.orig_action       = 'insert' AND tl.apply_id     IS NOT NULL
